scripts.watch: echo Compiling styles/*.scss and copying to ~/Projects/torq-native... for style development & nodemon --watch styles/src/ -e js,scss -x yarn build-styles-all
scripts._build-styles: mkdir -p styles/lib && (echo '// This file was generated by package.json > scripts > build-styles' ; cat styles/src/${INPUT}Header.scss ; cat styles/src/Spectrum.scss ; cat styles/src/${INPUT}Footer.scss) > styles/lib/Spectrum${OUTPUT}.scss && sass styles/lib/Spectrum${OUTPUT}.scss styles/lib/Spectrum${OUTPUT}.css && (cat styles/src/copyright.js ; echo 'module.exports = `' ; cat styles/lib/Spectrum${OUTPUT}.css ; echo '`;') > ~/Projects/torq-native/modules/bindings/domjs/src/js/dom/cssom/engine/SpectrumStyle${OUTPUT}.js
